title: AI SDK Chat Kernel
description: Settings for the AI SDK Chat Kernel

defaultProvider.title: Default Provider
defaultProvider.description: The AI provider to use. 'built-in-ai' uses Chrome Built-in AI with WebLLM fallback. Other options include openai, anthropic, google, or any custom provider name.

defaultModel.title: Default Model
defaultModel.description: The model to use when the kernel is first initialized. Model names are provider-specific. Use %chat list in a notebook to see available providers.
